long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Build your nugget empire one click at a time! In Nugget Clicker, you start by clicking to create nuggets, then use your earnings to upgrade production, unlock new recipes, and grow your nugget-making business. With endless upgrades and addictive gameplay, this game will keep you clicking for hours.
üçü Game Features:

    Simple and Fun Gameplay: Click to produce nuggets and expand your empire.
    Upgrades Galore: Unlock new tools and recipes to increase your nugget production.
    Idle Rewards: Keep earning nuggets even when you're offline.
    Tasty Graphics: Enjoy fun visuals that bring your nugget empire to life.

Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate nugget tycoon? Start clicking and find out in Nugget Clicker! üçó
